    API

    Review

    APIs power our desktop, web, mobile, and device applications. APIs are powering all of the applications, as well system to system integrations we depend on to make business happen each day. Each and every business today are using APIs, but what makes the difference is how they are taking control of the production and consumption of APIs across operations in repeatable ways.
    Your company is producing APIs today without the consistency you need across teams and lines of business. This often is the result of legacy practices building up, a lack of API design skills across teams, or a number of other factors. The inconsistencies across your APIs, and lack of alignment with common API practices are costing you money, and introducing unnecessary friction across your business operations.
    Our services are simple. We provide impartial external design reviews for your APIs. We aren't concerned with the same business and politics as you are, and can help be that extra set of eyes you need bring the consistency you need. We aren't the domain experts you are, but we know APIs, and can help bring the expertise you need to shift your API operations to the next level.

    The Business

    As part of our review we consider the business value being offered by your API, considering what the overall narrative is for your API, helping reduce the time it takes your API consumers to get up to speed.

    It is common for API producers to be so close to problem as well as the solution and overlook what is needed to get consumers what they need in as little time as possible.

    Sometimes a fresh pair of trained eyes can help see what is needed to improve the usability of your APIs.

    The name, description, tags, and other metadata about your API.

    Help you consider who will be using your API and what they will need.

    Thinking through what people will be doing when using your API.

    Considering how you will organize and discover your APIs using tags.

    We evaluate how you are managing change across your APIs.

    Ensuring your API tells a story and possesses a compelling narrative

    The Technical

    We enjoy looking at the technical details of your APIs and understand how they size up against the competition, evaluating the path, parameters, request bodies, responses, and other elements.

    Provide RESTful guidance regarding naming and structure of paths.

    Offer advice regarding how to use your nouns and verbs wisely.

    Assist in making sure each API operation is as intuitive as possible.

    Consider your path, query, and header parameters in our evaluation.

    Ensure that you are standardized across all of your API responses.

    Help you standardize the schema you are using in requests and responses.

    API Reviewers

    We have the API design talent that you have been looking for--available on demand, as you need it.

    You don't have time to get all your teams up to speed when it comes to API design, and can lean on our team as your core source of design talent, or as an overflow and second pair of eyes.

    Nick

    API Designer

    Nick is all about simple REST APIs, and the impact it can have they have when done well.

    Jerry

    API Architect

    Jerry is our old XML guy, who we have converted to the modern JSON way of doing things.

    Jon

    API Designer

    Jon is looking for the story in your API, making sure it is as intuitive as it possibly can.

    Get Your Review

    Getting a review for your API is simple, just tell us a little about you, and submit the form with your OpenAPI--here are the steps.
    • You Submit Form
    • We Receive Email
    • We Get You Quote
    • You Accept Quote
    • We Do the Review
    • We Invoice You
    • You Pay Invoice
    • We Publish Report
    We are low-tech here, contrasting the AI groundswell, focusing on doing one thing well, and standardizing your API operations today.
